messages.subject: Apologies
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for the sudden rush of answers to the question.  ^_^  (And, stupid me WOULD forget that OOC is used in fanfic, too.) First YIM started acting up on me
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for the sudden rush of answers to the question. ^_^ (And,
stupid me WOULD forget that OOC is used in fanfic, too.)

First YIM started acting up on me and crashing my computer. Now I'm
having trouble with mail. >_< The more they change things, the more
my computer is not digesting it well. (old age)

Again, sorry about that.

phil
